title: Update publication dates
body: Check footer, other locations in the document

title: Analytics config
body:
- [ ] Standard events for completion and click interaction
- [ ] Dimensions set in the project.json file--steal the primary topic, topic ID, and secondary topic IDs from related stories.
- [ ] Document any custom events in the README

title: Verify page title tags are good
Determine what the publish URL will be
body: Workshop w/ the engagement team. Sort this out before requesting redirects.

title: Setup retrospective review with editor
body: What did we learn? How do we do better next time?

title: Let the copy desk know an app is coming
Email media relations re: press releases
Email comms re: promoting the project in Nipper News
Social metadata and images (for Twitter, Facebook)
body: Images should have an aspect ratio of 1.91:1 and be a minimum of 1200 x 630. Verify with debuggers: https://developers.facebook.com/tools/debug/ and https://dev.twitter.com/docs/cards/validation/validator

title: Distribute launch timeline
body: Let stakeholders, engagement, social media, etc know what the launch schedule is

title: Browser testing
body:
- [ ] Edge 
- [ ] Chrome (OS X)
- [ ] Chrome (Android) 
- [ ] Chrome (Windows)
- [ ] Chrome (iOS) 
- [ ] Firefox (OS X)
- [ ] Firefox (Windows)
- [ ] Safari (iOS)
- [ ] Safari (iOS, in-app)

title: Accessibility testing
body: Works in screen reader, does not violate WCAG 2.1

title: Analytics report
body: Collect and study data one week after launch

title: Backport new features into the interactive template
